Uses of Package
com.embeddedunveiled.serial

  • Classes in com.embeddedunveiled.serial used by com.embeddedunveiled.serial 
    Class and Description
    ISerialComDataListener
    This interface represents Completion handler in our proactor design pattern.
    ISerialComEventListener
    This interface represents Completion handler in our proactor design pattern.
    ISerialComPortMonitor
    This interface need to be implemented by class who wants to monitor serial port.
    SerialComDataEvent
    This class encapsulate data received from serial port.
    SerialComErrorMapper
    This class helps in consistent error reporting in java layer mapping OS specific error numbers.
    SerialComException
    This limit the scope of exceptions in context of serial operation only.
    SerialComInByteStream
    This class represents an input stream of bytes which is received from serial port.
    SerialComJNINativeInterface
    This class load native library and is an interface between java and native shared library.
    SerialComLineEvent
    This class encapsulate events that happens on serial port control lines.
    SerialComLooper
    This class runs in as a different thread context and keep looping over data/event queue, delivering data/events to the intended registered listener (data/event handler) one by one.
    SerialComManager
    This class is the root of scm library.
    SerialComManager.BAUDRATE
    Pre-defined constants for baud rate values.
    SerialComManager.DATABITS
    Pre-defined constants for number of data bits in a serial frame.
    SerialComManager.ENDIAN
    Pre-defined constants for defining endianness of data to be sent over serial port.
    SerialComManager.FLOWCONTROL
    Pre-defined constants for controlling data flow between DTE and DCE.
    SerialComManager.FTPMODE
    Pre-defined constants for defining translation mode file transfer protocol to use.
    SerialComManager.FTPPROTO
    Pre-defined constants for defining file transfer protocol to use.
    SerialComManager.FTPVAR
    Pre-defined constants for defining variant of file transfer protocol to use.
    SerialComManager.NUMOFBYTES
    Pre-defined constants for defining number of bytes given data can be represented in.
    SerialComManager.PARITY
    Pre-defined constants for enabling type of parity in a serial frame.
    SerialComManager.STOPBITS
    Pre-defined constants for number of stop bits in a serial frame.
    SerialComOutByteStream
    This class represents an output stream of bytes that gets sent over to serial port for transmission.
    SerialComPortHandleInfo
    This class encapsulate port handle, looper object, event listener, data listener, port name etc associated with a particular port.
    SerialComReadStatus
    This class acts as a status messenger between native and java layer.
    SerialComRetStatus
    This class acts as a status messenger between native and java layer.
    SerialComTimeOutException
    This limit the scope of exceptions in context of serial operation only.
